title: 518 Cornwall Way
description: Where it all began. Sold our house and bought a travel trailer.

title: 11068 Musket St
description: Stayed with family

title: 1161 E Cougar Creek Dr
description: Stayed with family

title: Grayback Gulch
description: Our first foray into the wild :D

title: Midvale Rest Area
description: Stayed here for the night to wait out the storm.

title: Northwest Passage Campground
description: Stayed here a week, played in the river. Taught the dog how to swim.

title: Union Creek Campground
description: Stayed here for a couple of weeks, including July 4th. Family got sick.

title: Emigrant Springs
description: Stayed here for a couple weeks.

title: Winchester Lake
description: Stayed here a couple times, water was really murky.

title: Huckleberry Campground
description: Stayed here a couple of weeks. Cliff-jumping and playing in the river (very clear).

title: Homestake
description: Stayed here for a couple of weeks. Cleaned up campsites, chased cows, climbed rocks.

title: Farewell Bend
description: Stayed here for entirely too long, waiting for our youngest son to have a medical procedure.

title: Bully Creek Reservoir
description: Stayed here for a few days, in-between stays at Farewell Bend. Lots of dead fish, dirty bathrooms.

title: Viento State Park
description: Stayed for three nights. Waterfalls, fish hatchery, and watched people kite surfing.

title: Hudson Parcher County Parker
description: Stayed about a week. Magical campsite, but the bathrooms were a disaster.

title: Boiler Bay State Scenic Viewpoint
description: First night on the coast. Very windy, worried about getting kicked out.

title: Bullards Beach
description: Stayed here for a week or so. Beach was really cool, but not very close. Restrooms surrounded by a maze of thickets.

title: Grassy Flat Free Camping
description: Stayed here one night.

title: Valley of the Rogue State Park
description: Stayed here a week or so. Really awesome trails, narrow camp sites.

title: Donner Pass Rest Area
description: Stayed here one night.

title: Water Canyon
description: Stayed four nights.

title: Travertine Hot Springs
description: Stayed here one night.
